INTERNATIONAL CODE COUNCIL (ICC) SPECIAL INSPECTOR AND CONSTRUCTION MATERIALS TECHNICIAN (CMT)

OBJECTIVE

My objective is to obtain and secure a meaningful position integrating my skills with the expertise of my co — workers , resulting in a successful service provided to the client.
Additionally, I am eager to gain knowledge through my own hard work and the tutelage of my superiors to earn advancement within the organization.

SKILLS

Proficient in Microsoft Windows, Word, Excel.
General knowledge of GAAP that continues to grow through hard work.
14 years progressively advancing experience in civil construction materials testing and inspection.
Constant communication with contractors, craft, and co-workers in collaborative effort to complete task at hand.
Natural leader who is team oriented with strong desire succeed in accounting field.
Able to communicate effectively both verbally and in writing to clients, co-workers, and superiors.
Productive worker in fast — paced , time-sensitive environment, while remaining within budget.
Courteous team member who works with high levels of integrity and professionalism.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Outside Construction Sales Representative

Location: Temple, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Are you a go-getter, ready to conquer new challenges and boost your earnings? Heritage Construction is thrilled to announce opening for Construction Sales Representative, and we're on the lookout for dynamic individuals who are passionate about making a mark in the industry! As a family-owned company, we offer an energetic and supportive environment with endless possibilities for career growth. With a commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, we take pride in delivering top-notch roofing services to homeowners in the Austin, TX and surrounding areas.

Job Summary

As an Outside Construction Roofing Sales Representative, you will play a pivotal role in expanding our customer base and driving revenue growth. You will be responsible for identifying and cultivating new business opportunities by proactively engaging with homeowners in Austin and surrounding neighborhoods. Your primary focus will be on promoting our roofing services, educating potential customers, and closing sales deals.

Key Responsibilities

Prospecting and Lead Generation:

Conduct door-to-door outreach to identify potential customers in residential neighborhoods.Generate leads through effective communication.Utilize marketing materials and product knowledge to create interest and awareness.

Customer Engagement

Develop a strong understanding of the customer's roofing needs and concerns.Build rapport and trust with homeowners through professional and courteous interactions.

Sales Presentations

Conduct comprehensive and persuasive sales presentations to potential customers.Showcase the benefits of our roofing solutions, addressing customer inquiries and objections.Provide accurate and transparent pricing information.

Proposal And Contract Negotiation

Prepare detailed proposals based on customer needs and preferences.Clearly explain contract terms and secure signed agreements.

Relationship Building

Establish and maintain positive relationships with customers, fostering long-term loyalty.Collaborate with internal teams to ensure smooth project transitions from sales to implementation.

Sales Reporting And Goal Achievement

Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and leads.Meet or exceed sales targets.

Requirements

MUST HAVE A LATE MODEL TRUCK (Half ton or Larger) or the eagerness to invest in one before starting the job.Valid driver's license.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Self-motivated, goal-oriented, and able to work independently.Ability to handle rejection and overcome objections with persistence.Familiarity with the Austin, TX residential market is a plus.

COMPENSATION: In our commission-based sales model, we offer an attractive at-plan structure that provides competitive incentives and rewards, ensuring our sales team is motivated to achieve and exceed their targets.

Competitive commission structure.Health benefits, including medical and dental.Mileage reimbursement and other travel-related allowances.

Benefits

Dental insuranceFlexible scheduleHealth insurancePaid time off

Education

High school or equivalent (Required)

License/Certification

Driver's License (Required)

WORK LOCATION: 

On the road

Heritage Construction is an equal opportunity employer. We do not entertain third-party recruiting solicitations or candidates.

Ready to build your legacy? Apply today and let's construct a successful future together!

#HeritageConstruction #SalesOpportunity #CareerGrowth #JoinOurTeam

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
